text: I’ve been going for dental checkups and maintenance at T32 Camden for many years, and it’s always been a great experience each time. Dr Chin is very friendly, thorough and meticulous and there is no discomfort whatsoever when doing dental procedures. Registration is always fuss free and I’ve never had to wait more than 5-10 minutes. Kudos!

I had a great experience with Dr. Charles. He was very kind and patient, and made me feel completely at ease throughout the entire visit. The tooth extraction was smooth and surprisingly painless. I truly appreciate his professional and gentle care. Highly recommended!

I had all my wisdom teeth extractions performed at T32 Dental Centre (Camden), and the entire experience was exceptionally smooth and efficient. Each procedure went well, and the recovery process was seamless, with no complications.

The cost was also relatively affordable, particularly with the ability to utilise Medisave, which made the process more accessible and manageable.

I would like to extend my thanks to Grace, who was consistently helpful, responsive, and reassuring throughout my visits. I’m also deeply appreciative of Dr. Bruce, whose professionalism and clear communication made the procedures far less daunting.

I want to express gratitude for the outstanding care Dr Bruce and his team provide. Your professionalism, gentle approach, attention to detail always put me at ease, and it’s clear how much you genuinely care about your patients’ well-being.

Thank you for your dedication and for keeping my smile healthy!

Apart from the initial problems regarding appointment change and timing of which I have raised in my feedback to the clinic, the experience with Dr Lisa and her assistant were as usual excellent. Both were professional, efficient and made the whole scaling and polishing pain free and relaxed.
Dr Lisa always only does what is appropriate and necessary . She doesn't recommend procedures which may be aesthetic but not beneficial in view of my age and condition of my teeth and that is much appreciated.
